QuestData.Title: Slaves of the Stormforged
QuestData.Description: To the southwest, on the western side of the Snowdrift Plains, the iron dwarves have dug a mine into the hillside. There, they use captive mechagnomes, servants of Keeper Mimir, to mine ore.$B$BI don't know where these mechagnomes came from, nor what they would do with their freedom, but perhaps we can win their help.$B$BGo to the Frozen Mine, $n, and set these creatures free from their bondage. Ask if they would fight alongside us against iron dwarf tyranny.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bouldercrag the Rockshaper at Bouldercrag's Refuge wants you to free 6 Captive Mechagnomes and kill 3 Stormforged Taskmasters.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you freed the slaves of the stormforged?
QuestData.RewardText: I had hoped that more of the captives would choose to join us, but I do not blame them. Willing allies are few and far between, and we are thankful that you have lent your blade to our cause.
